text: Smilla's Sense of Snow is a 1997 Danish German Icelandic Swedish mystery thriller movie directed by Bille August and based on the 1992 novel of the same name by Peter Høeg. It stars Julia Ormond, Gabriel Byrne, Richard Harris, Jim Broadbent, Vanessa Redgrave, Tom Wilkinson, Robert Loggia, Bob Peck, David Schwimmer, Peter Capaldi, Jürgen Vogel and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1997 thriller movies Category:1990s mystery movies Category:Danish thriller movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Greenlandic movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Swedish thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Bille August Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer
title: Smilla's Sense of Snow
